name: BuyAssociation
tag_list: overseas-property, real-estate, homes-and-property, property-abroad, buying-a-house, international-real-estate, investment, finance
overview:
News and detailed information on how the property market works in various countries around the world. They also can help you with any questions people may have with investing in foreign property.

Guides and advice on how to deal with real estate, what the property laws are for foreign buyers, and how to deal with financial matters are all covered on this site. They have podcasts to go along with regular content and also release news on the property market overall. Most of the site concentrates on overseas property, though they have a smaller section about renovating homes and reselling (targeting users in the UK), a section about finance, and then a section about cosmetic surgery.
